title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-12.4 - Right of entry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-12.4 - Right of entry

State Regulations

The commissioner or officers and employees of the
department shall at any time, from commencement to completion of any asbestos
project, have the right to enter any part of such project, or at another time
for complaint investigation. Refusal to permit such entry may result in
application of appropriate penalties set forth in statute and code including
enjoining further work on the project. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
56-12.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
